Transdermal patch
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 19 - Warning: This medicine makes you sleepy. If you still feel sleepy the next day, do not drive or use tools or machines. Do not drink alcohol

Scopoderm 1.5mg patches <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Novartis Consumer Health UK Ltd)</ph> 9244511000001107

Hyoscine 1 mg per 72 hour

  • 2 patch P

    NHS indicative price = £4.52

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £4.52

HYOSCINE HYDROBROMIDE
